      static void isWritableFile(java.io.File file, java.lang.String parameterName)
      Checks if the passed file denotes a writable file by testing the following criteria: it is not the null reference it doesn't exist OR it is a regular file AND it is writable If any of the above criteria is not fulfilled an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

      • isReadableFile

        public static void isReadableFile(java.io.File file,
                  java.lang.String parameterName)
        Checks if the passed file fulfills the following criteria:
        • it is not null
        • it is a regular file
        • it exists
        • it can be read
        If any of the given criteria checks fails then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be checked
        parameterName - the name of the parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when the given file is not a regular file, an existent file or an unreadable file.

      • isReadableFile

        public static void isReadableFile(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject file,
                  java.lang.String parameterName)
        Checks if the passed file object fulfills the following criteria:
        • it is not null
        • it is a regular file
        • it exists
        • it can be read
        If any of the given criteria checks fails then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        file - the file object to be checked
        parameterName - the name of the parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when the given file is not a regular file, an existent file or an unreadable file.

      • isWritableDirectory

        public static void isWritableDirectory(java.io.File file,
                       java.lang.String parameterName)
        Checks if the passed file denotes a writable directory by testing the following criteria:
        • it is not the null reference
        • it is a directory
        • it is writable
        If any of the above criteria is not fulfilled an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        file - the directory to check
        parameterName - the name of the parameter

      • isWritableFile

        public static void isWritableFile(java.io.File file,
                  java.lang.String parameterName)
        Checks if the passed file denotes a writable file by testing the following criteria:
        • it is not the null reference
        • it doesn't exist OR
          • it is a regular file AND
          • it is writable
        If any of the above criteria is not fulfilled an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        file - the directory to check
        parameterName - the name of the parameter

      • isValidArray

        public static void isValidArray(java.lang.Object arr,
                java.lang.String parameterName)
        Checks the given object if it references to a valid array instance. This is done by checking the following conditions:
        • it must not be null
        • its class must be assignable to Object[].class
        If any of the above condition is not met, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown to indicate the appropriate error.
        Parameters:
        arr - the object to check
        parameterName - the name of the parameter

      • isValidArrayOfMinSize

        public static void isValidArrayOfMinSize(java.lang.Object arr,
                         int minSize,
                         java.lang.String parameterName)
        Checks the given object if it references to a valid array instance of the given minimum size.
        Parameters:
        arr - the object to check
        minSize - the minimum size of the array
        parameterName - the name of the parameter
        See Also:
        isValidArray(Object, String)

        public static void doThrow(java.lang.String parameterName,
           ParameterUtils.Reason reason,
           java.lang.String... arguments)

        Parameters:
        parameterName - parameter name
        reason - reason
        arguments - additional arguments
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
